Summary: looked bluer than other stars wasen't moving. got spy-glasses it's round solid red-green-white/clear twinkling lights moved-from-true-south-to-due-west/felt-like-it-knew-i-was-watching-it this-is-my-first-sighting-&-i'll-be-65-on-wensday
trends: There have been no other sightings in holtwood, pa.
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailshowdy, i live in a passive solar house. the south side is mostly glass, i was just looking outside befor going to bed & i noticed an odd colored star {more blue} it seamed to blink or twinkle, just enought to make me watch it. i saw that the stars were moving but not this one, i got out the spy-glasses got it in focas & to my suprize it was perfectly round it had red, blue, & white\clear lights that seamed to glissen or twinkle, no blinking. it was in the southern sky just about stright above me it was 10:10 pm iwent to the other side of the house to look at it & it was going\missing no sign of it. 10 minutes later ready to go to bed i looked out where i had seen it, i was a little freaked out when i saw it in the western sky. i grabed the benockulars ? it was still about a mile away. it was just below the tree line. i could not see it through the glasses but i could see it was there. iran back where i saw it on the south side of the house, it was just far enought to the west that i couldn't see it through the glasses. i went back to the west side & it was going. it moved when i moved inside the house so i'am still a little freaked out. i'am a veteran i'll be 65 on wed 4, jan this is my first sighting, greg --------------------------- +
